name: Bad Comrade MkI
details:
glitch, pitch, slice and dice distortion pedalIs is a distortion pedal? Is it a ring modulator? delay? Call it the Bad Comrade, the world’s first hand-wired glitch, pitch, slice and dice pedal. For the adventurous guitarist (or anyone wielding a 1/4” jack) that craves unthinkable tones, the Bad Comrade lets you distort, modulate, glitch and slice on the fly.
The Bad Comrade is point-to-point hand wired, with no printed circuit board. True bypass, chrome plated LED. lead-free solder, and U.S.A. parts whenever possible. It operates on a single 9 volt battery. It includes a full-lifetime warranty and 30 day money back guarantee.
CV input.
